name: MEMessageState
desc: The state of a message: sent, unsent, or received.

items.name: case draft
items.desc: A state that indicates the user is composing the message, and hasnâ€™t sent it yet.

items.name: case received
items.desc: A state that indicates the system has received and stored the message.

items.name: case sending
items.desc: A state that indicates the system is in the process of sending the message.
